title: Italian baked cannelloni
ingredients: ['125ml olive oil', '450g lean mince', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1/4 teaspoon dried sage', '1/4 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt to taste', '125ml white wine', '350g mozzarella cheese, cubed', '2 egg yolks', '50g butter', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml milk', '2 (400g) tins whole plum tomatoes', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '30g butter', '125ml white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', '12 cannelloni']
